description:
Class C3 (residential) as this is what the latest info we have to Class E (commercial)

Risley Primary School has a separate ''caretaker's house'' that our client wants to convert to be part of the nursery with some internal amendments which are purely for building control to deal with, the drawing is only uploaded so you can identify the space we need the change of use for.

Originally our client contacted Jamie from the local authority building control and he specified that on their system the so called caretaker's house is a residentual dwelling refered to Class C3, meaning we need to apply of changing it to Class E, or a nursery in other words.
site_name: Risley Avenue Primary School, The Roundway, Tottenham, London, N17 7AB
